description:
Prevent your back from getting soaked and muddy. The MudRocker fender is designed for full suspension bikes or bikes with a dropper post.

  • Made of fibreglass-reinforced plastic
  • Extenders can be clipped at the front and back to provide additional coverage
  • Rubberized hook and loop fasteners mount to the seat stays
  • Compatible with 27.5in., 28in., and 29in. tires 2.2-3in. wide
name: SKS MudRocker Rear Fender
